name: WebAppVulnerability
description: Case template for managing incidents related to vulnerabilities in web applications.
author: Jes√∫s Angosto
summary: Investigation and mitigation of a web application vulnerability.

tasks.title: Identify vulnerable components
tasks.description: Determine the scope of the vulnerability by identifying affected components and systems.

tasks.title: Assess risk
tasks.description: Evaluate the potential impact and likelihood of exploitation.

tasks.title: Develop mitigation plan
tasks.description: Create a plan to mitigate the vulnerability, including patching and additional controls.

tasks.title: Apply mitigation
tasks.description: Implement patches or security measures as defined in the plan.

tasks.title: Monitor exploitation attempts
tasks.description: Monitor logs and other telemetry to detect exploitation attempts targeting the vulnerability.

tasks.title: Strengthen security measures
tasks.description: Update and reinforce security controls to prevent future vulnerabilities.

tasks.title: Maintain chain of custody
tasks.description: Document and preserve relevant evidence while maintaining chain of custody throughout the process.

tasks.title: Document lessons learned
tasks.description: Analyze the incident and update procedures to improve responses to future vulnerabilities.
